name: Project 1 (cd448)
description: This app utilizes simple UI tools to interact with game objects that are created by the user. When the user clicks anywhere on the screen, it will create a sphere in that position. To delete all of these objects, the user can press the “Delete All” button. The user can also interact with these created objects by changing the color by using the dropdown menu. The user’s current mouse position coordinates are also displayed on the screen.
